Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Robin J. Cole
Reviews.Content: When I signed up for Boost Mobile, the i776 cell phone was the best offered. The phone has a great design. I love the velvety feel and sleek design. The style is small and compact. The buttons on the phone are easy to use.In researching the pay by the month plans currently available, I found Boost Mobile was the best deal. The coverage area is large. The plan I had previously on a two year contract with a major carrier, did not give me any signal inside my apartment. The payment each month with Boost Mobile is the same as what I was paying for a two year contract. I chose the unlimited plan costing $50 a month. This includes unlimited calls and unlimited internet use with my phone.The i776 has great features. The phone has a camera which offers two picture qualities-normal and fine. The size of the picture comes with four settings- wp 128x160, small 128x96, medium 160x120, large 320x240, and x-large 640x480. There is an airport setting as well. If this is activated, the phone will shut off whenever a person enters a place where cell phones are not allowed and turn back on when they leave the area. The phone is Bluetooth enabled and GPS. (RJC)

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: JORGE GARCIA
Reviews.Content: good product, all are ok, good seller . I recomended this seller for others buyers. if i like other phone i buy again with this seller.

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: jewels
Reviews.Content: i was very unhappy with the walkie talkie cell phone i purchaced. it said everything was ok. it is used of course. well when i went to call my boyfriends phone that i bought him,he cant here me unless its on speaker. it doesnt vibrate. it said it comes with a camera but it doesnt work. i dont know how to return it. please help

Reviews.Title: LFE DISTRIBUTION
Reviews.Author: Maka
Reviews.Content: Very bad service. phone was in spanish & when i called to inquire, the people couldn't speak english. I'm having a hard time returning the item...

Reviews.Title: GoodBye to Not a good buy
Reviews.Author: Xipp
Reviews.Content: This is a very basic cell phone,With weak signal strength and a camera that a blind sketch artist could reproduce a better image. Unreal they still are raping people $ 99.00 for this pile. Also lets not forget that after about 3 months of use the headset speaker will go out and the only way to hear a call will be on speaker phone,Kiss any privacy goodbye. In closing choose another phone you will not be happy with this one...

Reviews.Title: voice recognition went out after a couple months had to use speaker
Reviews.Author: K. martin "kmart"
Reviews.Content: voice recognition went out after a couple months then I had to use speaker phone all the time.  do not use this because u get choppy service from boost.  It will worth paying the extra 10 or 20 dollars per month for different carriers.  I gurantee.
